welcome_message_body: Welcome to Battalgazi, a charming city known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Battalgazi Kahvaltı Salonu
restaurants.description: Battalgazi Kahvaltı Salonu is a breakfast spot located in the city.

restaurants.name: Battalgazi Otağı
restaurants.description: Battalgazi Otağı is a theme restaurant located in Malatya.

restaurants.name: cafe biyer
restaurants.description: cafe biyer is a cafeteria located in the city.
restaurants.address: Alacakapi mahallesi Osman Ateş Caddesi (Ahmet Yesevi Caddesi), 44210 Malatya

restaurants.name: Ramazan Usta
restaurants.description: Ramazan Usta is a doner restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Aşk Olsun
restaurants.description: Aşk Olsun is a café located in the city.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Malatya Airport serves all international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Malatya Airport serves all domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
